question: what is jan schmid?
answer: With Bachelor of Arts - BA from Hochschule Augsburg, Fachhochschulreife from Berufsoberschule Friedberg, Bankkaufmann from Sparda-Bank Augsburg eG, Jan Schmied has 2 mos of experience as a Gebietsleiter at Schefer Mietstapler GmbH in Friedberg, Bayern, Deutschland, 1 yr of experience as a HR-Manager at proSenio Gruppe in, 1 yr 7 mos of experience as a Junior Business Partner HR / Kommunikation & Change at Tenneco in Friedberg, Bayern, Deutschland, 8 mos of experience as a Bankkaufmann Privatkundengeschäft at Sparda-Bank Augsburg eG in Augsburg, Bayern, Deutschland and is proficient in Recruiting, HR-Management, Interne Kommunikation, Change Communications, HR-Transformation, HR-Projektmanagement, Controlling, Personalentwicklung, Teamkoordination, Microsoft Office, SAP HR.
